ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Another Nerf (but we can't complain about this one!)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You sure it was mez ed and stood there?  It used to be you could mez and stun them, and the message would say it succeeded, but it would have no effect. I
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 18 Apr 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
>
> Me and Suladan (48 bard) tried to charm aza's. 100% resist. 100% taunt.
> 100% dead. Meanwhile, a lev 50 enchanter stuck mez on one so looks like the
> bard uber-charm is gone but aza's are now mezz-able. Things were kinda

You sure it was mez'ed and stood there? It used to be you
could mez and stun them, and the message would say it
succeeded, but it would have no effect.

I found them to be nearly immune to magic/fire/cold, until
after a molasi. Then I could usually get fire or cold to
stick (one or the other, seemed to depend on the individual
azarak).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
